item.description:
The day has finally come!

As I wrote on my comment, i will try to be there by 6:45 and will hang out at the main entrance (outside) until 7:15 or so to meet you guys!

I'm a redhead and will be wearing my "Killers" shirt! You can call me at (857) 209-8223 if you can't find me =]

Rock on and enjoy the show \m/

Thaty

----------------------------------

Have you heard the news?!?! They are back!!!!!!!!!!!!! Mighty Maiden and Alice Cooper will be destroying the Comcast Center in June! Just found out on Tickemaster and I CAN'T wait!!! Tickets go on sale on March 3 - (Feb 29 pre-sale) $55-$100
item.name: Iron Maiden and Alice Cooper
